text: Danielle Jane "Dannii" Minogue (born 20 October 1971) is an Australian pop singer, actress, presenter and model. She is the sister of Kylie Minogue. Her most successful hit was "Who Do You Love Now". Other than singing, she is known for her television appearances in Australia and the United Kingdom. She was a judge on the British television programme The X Factor from 2007 to 2010. She was also a judge on the first three seasons of the Australian Masked Singer and on the Australian version of X Factor. == Personal life == She was born Danielle Jane Minogue in Melbourne on 20 October 1971 to a Welsh immigrant mother and Irish-Australian father. ==References== ==Other websites== * Official website * Category:Actors from Melbourne Category:Australian child actors Category:Australian models Category:Australian movie actors Category:Australian pop singers Category:Australian singer-songwriters Category:Australian television actors Category:Musicians from Melbourne Category:1971 births Category:Living people Category:Australian composers Category:Australian television presenters Category:Mezzo-sopranos Category:The X Factor Category:Vegetarians
title: Dannii Minogue
